name: ACH_SACRIFICE_4_SURVIVORS_IAM
description: In a public match, get 4 sacrifices in a single match.

name: ACH_SACRIFICE_100_CAMPERS
description: In public matches, sacrifice a total of 100 survivors.

name: ACH_SACRIFICE_1000_CAMPERS
description: In public matches, sacrifice a total of 1000 survivors.

name: ACH_100_PICKUP_TRAPPED
description: In public matches, with the Trapper, catch a total of 100 survivors in your Bear Traps.

name: ACH_100_CHASE_INVISIBLE

name: ACH_HOOKED_ESCAPE

name: ACH_50_ESCAPES

name: ACH_HEALDYING_OR_UNHOOK

name: ACH_HEALDYING_OR_UNHOOK_POSTEXIT

name: ACH_HEAL
description: In public matches, heal others for a total of 100 health states.

name: ACH_REPAIR
description: In public matches, repair generators for a total of 100 full repairs.

name: ACH_SKILL_CHECK

name: ACH_CAMPER_MAXSCORE_BYCAT

name: ACH_10K_POINTS_ONECATEGORY

name: ACH_BLOODWEB_LVL50

name: ACH_BLOODWEB_1M_PTS
